TopicTitle: The SkidPlane- Command Seats instead of Landing gear

Articles.Content:
So I was messing with a glider on Duna, and it crashed XD

When the probe and seat broke off, I noticed that making it skid on the seat worked well.

So I threw together this cr*p of a plane:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Apparently command seats work more or less well and landing gear, though be careful when taxiing, random sliding is imminent!

Download
I tried it but the landing didn't work out too well.

Yeah you have to land very gently, first let the aft 2 seats touch the runway, but try to keep the front seat up in the air Neil the last moment. Also mind it might drift to the side, so keep yaw control in mind
